name: Gold Rush Classic
description:
Take a train and go for GOLD!
But it's not easy because there aren't any rails.
You have to track them down!

But you've got the limited time.
Do it as fast as you can or the train will crash.

Gold Rush features:
- clean and intuitive interface
- a lot of levels
- summer and winter levels
- Game Center support

Enjoy the fantastic puzzle game!
